an5.173:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato upasako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.173:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato upasako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.173:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato upasako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an5.173:2.3: Panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an5.173:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato upasako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
